sentence.text: In order to investigate whether somatic positive regulation of hematopoietic stem cell proliferation gene mutations play a role in sporadic pediatric myeloproliferative diseases, we performed a mutation screening of a large representative cohort of pediatric acute myeloid leukemia, myeloid leukemia of Down syndrome, and juvenile myelomonocytic leukemia samples and show that gain-of-function THPO mutations are extremely rare in sporadic pediatric myeloproliferative diseases

entity.text: positive regulation of hematopoietic stem cell proliferation
